js_description: Search functionality, carousel for featured products, navigation menu interactions, dynamic content loading, user login and registration.
description: Main page of the website, showcasing the leading B2B ecommerce platform with various sections such as a powerful search bar, carousel for featured products, trading services, and user account management. The page is designed to provide an optimal user experience with a responsive layout, fast loading times, and intuitive navigation.
practice_features: Responsive design, optimized loading speed, accessible layout, intuitive navigation, user-friendly interface.
additional_features: User account management, personalized recommendations, real-time notifications, multi-language support, secure payment options.

js_description: Handles user authentication, performs form validation, and manages error messages for invalid credentials. It also facilitates social media sign-in and password reset functionalities.
description: Sign in page for users to access their accounts. The page includes fields for username and password, and offers options for social media sign-in and password reset. The layout is user-friendly, with a focus on security and ease of use.
practice_features: Secure login with encrypted credentials, real-time error messages for invalid inputs, user-friendly interface with clear instructions, and responsive design for mobile compatibility.
additional_features: Option to reset password via email, social media sign-in through platforms like Google and Facebook, CAPTCHA for added security, and two-factor authentication support.

js_description: Handle user registration, form validation, real-time validation feedback, password strength checks, and form submission handling.
description: The signup page allows new users to create an account securely and easily. It ensures a smooth registration process with real-time validation feedback and user-friendly error messages. The page prioritizes user experience and security.
practice_features: Secure registration, real-time validation feedback, password strength meter, detailed error messages, CAPTCHA for bot prevention, tooltips for form guidance.
additional_features: Option to sign up with social media (Google, Facebook, Twitter), email verification through a confirmation link, responsive design, accessibility features.

js_description: Interactive elements to explain about the platform, including animations, tooltips, and collapsible sections.
description: The About page provides comprehensive information about the platform, including its mission, vision, team, and history. It aims to build trust with users by offering transparency and detailed insights into the platform's background and values. This page also highlights key achievements and milestones.
practice_features: Informative content, responsive design, clear and intuitive navigation, user-friendly interface.
additional_features: Embedded videos, customer testimonials, interactive timeline of the platform's history, team member profiles with hover effects, and a FAQ section.

js_description: Display popular products with filtering options
description: Page showing the most popular products

js_description: Display new arrivals with filtering options, dynamic sorting, and real-time updates.
description: This page showcases the latest products added to the store. Users can browse through new arrivals, filter products by categories, price range, and customer ratings. The layout includes a grid view of products with high-quality images, brief descriptions, and quick view options. Users can also sort products by popularity, price, and release date.

buttons.button_name: Sort by Price: Low to High
Sort by Price: High to Low

practice_features: Product filtering, sorting options, grid view layout, quick view feature, real-time updates.
additional_features: Customer reviews, product ratings, discount badges, product availability status, add to wishlist feature.

js_description: Display products with special discounts, dynamically update discounts based on user-selected categories, and handle sorting and filtering of discounted products.
description: This page showcases a variety of products that are currently available at discounted prices, helping users find the best deals. Users can browse through various categories, filter products based on their preferences, and sort the list by different criteria such as discount percentage, price, and customer ratings. The page aims to enhance the shopping experience by highlighting savings and special offers.
practice_features: Product filtering, sorting options, category selection, discount highlighting.
additional_features: Customer reviews, product ratings, real-time discount updates, wish list feature, notification for new discounts.

description: Page showing products that can be sampled

js_description: Display information about verified suppliers, dynamically update supplier details, and facilitate user interactions with filters and sorting options.
description: This page provides comprehensive details on verified suppliers, displaying them in a user-friendly layout. Users can view verification badges, supplier ratings, and detailed reviews. The page also allows users to filter suppliers by various criteria, such as category, location, and rating, and sort the results for easier navigation.
practice_features: Display of supplier verification details, interactive sorting options, advanced filtering capabilities.
additional_features: User-generated reviews and ratings, real-time updates as filters are applied, detailed supplier profiles accessible via links, highlighted verification badges, interactive modals for detailed reviews.

js_description: Display information about trade assurance, including interactive elements for user engagement, such as testimonials, case studies, and contact forms.
description: This page provides comprehensive details on trade assurance services, including benefits, how it works, and why it is important for users. The page aims to educate users on the security and reliability trade assurance brings to their transactions.
practice_features: Informative content, responsive design, user testimonials, case studies, interactive elements.
additional_features: Customer testimonials, case studies, video tutorials, FAQ section, contact form for more information.
